name: Radial Fish Scale Tiles
description: Fish scale tiles that come in a variation of smooth tiles and radial-line tiles or just smooth tiles. Both variations come in two color patterns: Blue + Green, and Terracotta + beige. The Vray materials are set up with seamless Displacement maps + bump map for closeup views OR Normal maps + bump map for more distant views. Maps: Diffuse map(JPG), Displacement map (16Bit PNG), Normal map(PNG), Bump map(PNG) Map dimensions: 4K (4096p x 4096p) Tile Dimensions: 125mm x 125mm (800mm x 880mm UVW map size) Formats: max2014, max2017, OBJ Show more
short_description:
Platform:	 3dsMax 2014 + obj
Render:	 Vray
Size:	 101 MB
Style:	 Ethnic
Materials:	 Stone
